name: Metropolitan Skies
description: Navigate through dense urban environments with skyscrapers and complex air traffic patterns. Use buildings for cover and navigate tight spaces while avoiding civilian aircraft.

name: Canyon Corridors
description: High-speed low-altitude flying through narrow canyon passages with tight turns and obstacles. Master precision flying as you navigate through challenging terrain.

name: Arctic Storm
description: Extreme weather conditions with limited visibility and challenging ice formations. Battle against both enemy aircraft and the harsh environment.

name: Desert Heat
description: Scorching temperatures and sandstorms create unique challenges. Thermal effects impact engine performance and visibility is constantly changing.

name: Mountain Peaks
description: High-altitude combat above snow-capped peaks. Thin air affects engine performance and requires careful fuel management.

name: Coastal Waters
description: Maritime operations with carrier-based missions and naval threats. Salt air and changing weather patterns add complexity to operations.
